item.title: Overwatch 2: World Cup 2025 Details
item.description: Blizzard announces Overwatch World Cup 2025 with record-breaking prize pool and new format.

item.title: Fortnite World Cup 2025: Biggest Prize Pool Ever
item.description: Epic Games announces record-breaking $30 million prize pool for Fortnite World Cup 2025 with new format and locations.
